name: Production Line (itch)
description:
Introduction

You, Factory Manager #0035126, have been tasked with keeping a small part of the world running against all that it might throw at you. Build, maintain, and manage your factory to our satisfaction.

Please note that, as stated in the included optional Mandatory Training Program, we can accept no responsibility for any damage and/or explosions which may occur. These are regular wear and tear, and are unavoidable. Likewise, any damage resulting from disciplinary procedures will also be categorised as regular wear and tear and so we bear no liability.

The orders of The Economy await fulfilment. We wish you an acceptable experience.

Tips

Tooltips have been provided for your convenience; simply hold your mouse over an item to read the description.

Controls

Point and click (and occasionally press enter when instructed)

Credits

Made in 72 hours using Godot for Mini jam 110

Music/ambience by original_sound and Speedenza from FreeSound.

All art and code created by me during the jam. My arms hurt from the typing.
